snippet: Leading members of Congress joined the defense secretary and the chairman of the Joint Chiefs in arguing against cuts in military spending beyond the $450 billion already ordered.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: Leading members of Congress joined the defense secretary and the chairman of the Joint Chiefs in arguing against cuts in military spending beyond the $450 billion already ordered.

headline.main: In and From Congress, Calls to Limit Pentagon Cuts
headline.print_headline: In and From Congress, Calls to Limit Pentagon Cuts
